DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine correlation digital palpation , perineometry dynamometry PFM function evaluation method nulliparous without pelvic floor dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Among Vaginal Palpation , Vaginal Squeeze Pressure Dynamometry Nulliparous Pelvic Floor Muscles
DOC.detailed_description: Study design - study conduct Cinesiofunctional Performance Laboratory Pelvic Women 's Health Federal University Uberlandia ( UFU ) , volunteer recruit December 2014 July 2015 . This observational , cross-sectional comparative study , sample consist 141 nulliparous woman ( non-pregnant nulliparous primigravids ) . All volunteer shave sign informed consent study approve Ethics Committee Federal University Uberlandia ( No.1067162/2014 ) . Female student UFU invited personal contact participate study . The primigravids participant Prenatal Program public health system Uberlandia city also invite personal contact . Inclusion criterion volunteer : never pass childbirth situation , ability contract correctly PFM without urogynecological complaint . Exclusion criterion : history previous pelvic surgery , without previous sexual intercourse , present neuromuscular disease . The experient examiner , expertise PFM evaluation conduct evaluation . After check eligible participate survey , participant ask empty bladder remain supine position appropriate bed hip knee flex maintain lumbar spine neutral position.The PFM assessment perform vaginal palpation , vaginal squeeze pressure dynamometry . The vaginal palpation vaginal squeeze pressure widely use research involve female pelvic floor many study show reproducibility validity ( 10 , 11 , 12 , 13 ) . The measurement perform dynamometer study similar study Martinho et al ( 4 ) use instrument demonstrate reproducibility assessment method . During PFM assessment , volunteer advise stay relaxed breathe normally . To consider valid , cranial elevation movement observe examiner , well absence visible contraction adductor , muscle hip , gluteal muscle abdominal . Strong verbal command adopt request PFM contraction exam . Assessments begin explain perform PFM contraction . The vaginal palpation always first exam check PFM contraction ability order vaginal squeeze pressure exam dynamometry randomize . The PFM assessment digital palpation perform propose Laycock Jerwood . The physiotherapist introduce index middle finger 4 cm inside vagina , request hold maximum contraction PFM , accord instruction movement `` inward '' great possible strength . Muscle function classify Oxford Scale Modified , varies zero ( absence muscle contraction ) five ( strong contraction ) . The vaginal squeeze pressure measure Peritron equipment ( Cardio Design Pty Ltd , Oakleigh , Victoria , Australia ) equip vaginal probe cover non-lubricated condom probe lubricate hypoallergenic gel . The probe sensor connect microprocessor hand latex tube , allow measurement nip pressure centimeter water ( cmH2O ) . To obtain measurement , subject remain position vaginal sensor introduce approximately 3.5cm vaginal cavity . Then device inflate 100cmH2O ( calibration ) . The female volunteer orient motivate verbally perform three voluntary maximal contraction sustain five second one minute interval . The correct contraction check visually physiotherapist . All volunteer instruct avoid use abdominal muscle , gluteal hip adductor . For statistical analysis , investigator use peak pressure provide equipment . The PFM contraction strength assess vaginal dynamometer EMG System Brasil ( model DFV 020.101/10 ) . It cylindrical shape ( 9.5 cm length 3.3 cm diameter ) , make steel equip load cell 2 cm base , measure anteroposterior unidirectional compressive strength Kg/force ( Kgf ) . The equipment previously coat condom lubricate hypoallergenic gel , insert vaginal cavity load cell position could capture anteroposterior compression strength . The participant ask perform three maximal voluntary PFM contraction eight second rest period 30 second contraction . The precaution correct contraction adopt . The best value maximum strength ( difference high low strength Kgf ) use statistical analysis . Statistical analysis perform use Statistical Package Social Sciences software ( SPSSV17 , Chicago , IL ) . Data normality test Shapiro-Wilk test . To verify correlation variable , Pearson correlation test use . Values p < 0.05 consider significant . The correlation value interpret accord follow guideline : 0.00 - 0.19= slight ; 0.20-0.39= mild ; 0.40-0.69= moderate ; 0.70-0.89= high 0.90-1.00= high . Data express mean standard deviation ( SD ) .
DOC.criteria: never pass childbirth situation ability contract correctly PFM without urogynecological complaint history previous pelvic surgery without previous sexual intercourse present neuromuscular disease
